beer.beer_description: A könnyebb pilseni kategóriába tartozik. Tiszta, alig érezhető komlóillat jellemzi e tükrös tisztaságú, aranysárga sört. Kissé kesernyés, enyhén malátaízű, gyengén aromás, közepesen komlós. Jó habzóképességű és habtartósságú, széndioxidban dús. 1998-ban, 2000-ben, 2001-ben és 2002-ben a Monde Selection zsűrije aranyéremmel jutalmazta.

items.badge_description: Supporting local breweries is what helps the craft beer scene grow. You obviously know this since you’re enjoying the local flavor! Be sure to always drink locally.

Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 10 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 3!
Hungarian breweries are popping up at a rapid pace, expanding the beer, or sör, culture of the country of Hungary. That's 10 different beers from a brewery from Hungary.  Try 5 more for Level 3!

items.badge_description: Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least 80 distinct venues!

Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 95 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 20!
Hungarian breweries are popping up at a rapid pace, expanding the beer, or sör, culture of the country of Hungary. That's 10 different beers from a brewery from Hungary.  Try 5 more for Level 3!

items.badge_description: Beer is often better with friends. Besides, drinking socially is what we're all about! You've checked in with at least 10 other people within 5 hours.
Drinking with friends is fun. Right? You've checked in with at least 4 other people within 2 hours.
So, you're new around here? Congrats on your first brew! This one's for you.

Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

items.badge_description: It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That's 355 check-ins with a photo.  Try 5 more for Level 72!
99 bottles of beer on the wall, 99 bottles of beer. Take one down, pass it around.... That's 110 checkins with the serving style of Bottle. Try 5 more for Level 23!

items.badge_description: There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 100 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 21!
Light and crisp, a Pilsner is all you need to make your day great. Though, perhaps another one would make it even better. That’s 30 different Pilsners. Try 5 more for Level 7!
